MARYLAND PROMISE YOUTH SURVEY

DIRECTIONS: Thank you for taking the time to complete this survey. The information you provide will be used mainly to help us understand how Maryland PROMISE may have made a difference in your life, and how we can improve our work to better prepare you and other youth for the future. All information will be treated confidentially in that no person’s responses will be presented, and no names or identifying information will be used. For completing the survey
